item.title: Docker
item.description: Problem A Dockerfile based on nginx:stable or nginx:latest didn’t build and gave a error during the compile step with hugo. Analyse After checking both nginx images, I noticed the stable and latest image for nginx on Docker hub, uses the old Debian Buster (10) as base image. After checking the version of hugo, this was for both images an old version and the website didn’t compile. Solution The solution was to use a current Debian Bullseye (11) as base image and install nginx and hugo using apt-get.
